actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to relieve employers of 50 or less employees from the requirements of paying or depositing certain employment taxes more often than once each quarter.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers of 50 persons or less to forward payroll taxes quarterly.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to relieve employers of 50 or less employees from the requirements of paying or depositing certain employment taxes more often than once each quarter.
